user.title: Add TP-Link VIGI Camera
user.description:
Configure your first VIGI camera. The camera will send webhook notifications to Home Assistant.

Webhook URL format: `{base_url}/api/webhook/WEBHOOK_ID`

confirm.title: Camera Added: {camera_name}
confirm.description:
Configure your camera to send events to this webhook URL:

**`{webhook_url}`**

Webhook ID: `{webhook_id}`

Would you like to add another camera?

add_another.title: Add Another Camera
add_another.description:
Add camera #{camera_count} to your TP-Link VIGI integration.

Webhook URL format: `{base_url}/api/webhook/WEBHOOK_ID`

error.duplicate_name: A camera with this name already exists
error.duplicate_webhook: This webhook ID is already in use
error.invalid_webhook_id: Webhook ID can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores

abort.already_configured: This webhook ID is already configured

add_camera.title: Add New Camera
add_camera.description:
Add a new camera to this integration.

Webhook URL format: `{base_url}/api/webhook/WEBHOOK_ID`

edit_camera_form.title: Edit Camera Details
edit_camera_form.description:
**Warning:** Changing the webhook ID will change the webhook URL. You'll need to update your camera configuration.

Old webhook ID: `{old_webhook_id}`
